name: Ad Astra (Yirggzmb)
description:
Atmospheric platformer. I'll leave it to you to explore. 
Created for the #MusicGameJam

Note: You cannot die. If you fall out of the world, you respawn at the last checkpoint.

Controls 
Enter - Open/close controls customization menu 
A - Default move left 
D - Default move right 
Space - Default jump 

Music and Art are my own creations
- Music created with Soundation 
- Art created mostly with Paint.NET 
- Game created in Game Maker Studio 2

Things I Attempted to Learn for this Jam 
- Music composing  (Feel like I'm improving) 
- Game Maker's particles system (Complicated! But workable) 
- Custom key bindings (Fun! Limited in scope for this though)
